usage:
Usage: 

!admin list - List of admins

!admin list add <number> [<nickname>] - Adds an user to admin list

!admin list delete <index> - Deletes an user from admin list. You can get the index with !admin list


!admin set status <text> - Set bot's status message

!admin set picture <url> - Set bot's profile picture


!admin uptime - Returns bot's uptime
message:list:delete:cant_delete_0: You can't delete admin with ID 0
message:set:picture:download_error: There is a download error. Check the url!
message:uptime:days:
Started at %s
%d days %d hours %d minutes %d seconds
